titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on biaxially oriented polypropylene dielectric film.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 7/12/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on biaxially oriented polypropylene dielectric film.
